remarks: There exists a symbol such that its concatenation with the subword obtained by deleting the last symbol of a nonempty word results in the word itself.  (Contributed by AV, 5-Oct-2018.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 24-Oct-2018.)
statement:
ccats1swrdeqrex $p |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ U e. Word V /\ ( # ` U ) = ( ( # ` W ) + 1 ) ) -> ( W = ( U substr <. 0 , ( # ` W ) >. ) -> E. s e. V U = ( W ++ <" s "> ) ) ) $.
$d U s $.
$d V s $.
$d W s $.
